data.oai_dc:dc: The eddy flux data used in this paper for RJA site. The data are processed in the same way as Restrepo-Coupe et al. 2013. What drives the seasonality of photosynthesis across the Amazon basin? A cross-site analysis of eddy flux tower measurements from the Brasil flux network. Agricultural and forest meteorology, 182, 128-144
Phenology|Photosynthetic Capacity|Climate|Leaf Quantity|Leaf Quality|Proximal Remote Sensing|MODIS EVI
